briefTitle: Level of HER2-neu Gene Amplification an Response to Trastuzumab
officialTitle: Retrospective Study of the Level of HER2-neu Gene Amplification as Predictive Factor of Response in Patients With HER2-positive Advanced Breast Cancer Treated With Trastuzumab Containing Regimens.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Association of tumor cytogenetic paremeters with TTP and OS.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* HER2-positive breast cancer Trastuzumab-containing regimen delivered for advanced disease Tumor sample available at Pathology Archive

Exclusion Criteria:

* HER2-negative advanced breast cancer Pretreatment with trastuzumab
